displayProperties.description:
Turn your back on the Vanguard to stand with the Drifter.

This decision has consequences:

 • This character will experience different quest content and receive different rewards than characters who stand with the Vanguard.
 • The Drifter will remember your choice.
 • This character will not have complete access to the "The Warlock Aunor" lore book.
 • This choice may impact future content for this character.
displayProperties.name: Stand with the Drifter
